name: Inven-Towny
description:
This is Inven-Towny, the arena dungeon and inventory/town management game. Watch as a community, lives, grows, and dies all within your rucksack! But be careful, as the sheriff-knight of the rucksack folk, you're under constant attack from the robo-pirates. Wise management of your rucksack can make you more powerful, and help you loot your enemies of their gold!

Left mouse to drag items into your sack. Middle mouse to shoot arrows. Space to use your longsword.

Items:

  • Barracks: Pink towers that make more swords
  • Swords: Increase damage stat of sword attack
  • Apple: Can be turned into health by villagers
  • Arrow: Increase amount of arrows in inventory
  • Bomb: Use to empty the squares around it when placed
  • Bow: Increases damage stat of bow attack
  • Farm: Grows wheat
  • Wheat: Can be turned into health by villagers
  • Health: Increases health state
  • House: Spawns villagers
  • Lumberyard: Grayish two-storied building that spawns wood
  • Wood: Can be turned into bows by villagers
  • Shield: Blocks poison and fire
  • Poison: Consumes apples, wheat, and health
  • Fire: Destroys anything in an occupied square
